*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Gallatin Tennessee*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-10-1826">Apl 10th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*, *p* It has been about *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1814">twelve years since*/date_mentioned* I had the pleasure of seeing you and ere this you must nearly have forgotten me, as we were but seldom together, but you must recollect our having been on an expedition up the *location_mentioned*Illinois river*/location_mentioned* together under the command of the late *person_mentioned*Genl Howard*/person_mentioned*—and of seeing each other in *location_mentioned*Lexington Ky*/location_mentioned*—in the *date_mentioned n="WInter - 1814">winter of 1814*/date_mentioned*. and *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1815">15*/date_mentioned*—from the above circumstances you will be enabled to recollect me I think—My *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*acquaintances */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr Ramsey L. Mason*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr Vinson*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr McCall*/person_mentioned* visits your *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and will hand you this—They are all *person_mentioned*Gentlemen */person_mentioned*of the first respectability in this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*—and any services you can render them whilst in your [country] will be acknowledged by your Acquaintance*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Robt. Desha*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*-P. S. It would be pleasing to me to receive a letter from you. giving me your candid opinion of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*you are in etc—*/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
